name: Hungry Hungry Trilobites
description:
By: Team Quadolor (@QuadolorGames, @Adanzo)
For ROM Game Jam 2016 - Dawn of Life


Rules

Many trilobites compete to eat more food than the others, even if they have to bump the others around. Each trilobite prefers the food the matches their colour.

Preferred food - 3 points
All other food - 1 point


Controls
Players 1 and 2 (Controllers)

D-pad/Left Stick - Steer
A - Move forward
B - Move backwards


Player 3 (Keyboard)

A/D - Steer
W - Move forward
S - Move backwards


Player 4 (Keyboard)

Left/Right Arrow - Steer
Up Arrow - Move forward
Down Arrow - Move backwards
